rules.name: Get Stuck In
rules.lore: Once an Ork gets stuck into close-quarters combat, they quickly overwhelm their enemies through sheer ferocity.
rules.text: Melee weapons equipped by your +Orks+ units have +[Sustained Hits 1]+

spells.name: Roar of Mork
spells.effect: Enemy units within 15" must take a Battle-Shock test, with -1 to the Battle-Shock test roll.

spells.name: Spirit of Gork
spells.effect: Select a friendly +Orks+ +Infantry+ unit within 12". Until the end of the Battle Round, its equipped melee weapons have +[Devastating Wounds]+

spells.name: Da Jump
spells.effect: Move this model's unit to anywhere on the battlefield that is at least 9" away from all enemy models.

strategems.name: Ere We Go
strategems.effect: Until the end of the Activation, the target unit has +2 to Advance and Charge rolls.

strategems.name: Careen!
strategems.when: When an +Orks Vehicle+ unit from your army with the +Deadly Demise X+ ability is destroyed, after rolling for its +Deadly Demise X+ ability.
strategems.effect: The target +Vehicle+ can make a Normal or Fall Back movement before its +Deadly Demise X+ ability is resolved, and before any embarked units perform an Emergency Disembarkation. When making this movement, the target +Vehicle+ may move through enemy units (excluding +Monsters+ and +Vehicles+ as if they were not there.

strategems.name: Unbridled Carnage
strategems.effect: Until the end of the Activation, unmodified Hit rolls of 5+ score a Critical Hit.
